description.en: penMediaVault (OMV) is a free, open-source network-attached storage (NAS) solution built on Debian Linux. It's designed for home users and small offices, providing a user-friendly web interface to manage file storage, sharing, and other services. OMV allows users to share files across a network using protocols like SMB/CIFS, FTP, and NFS, and it can be extended with plugins for added functionality.
